receivedPermissions.description: manage all access control roles, upgrade deployed contracts for BridgeTokens, set metadata and config values, manage token registrations, pause and unpause.

entries.name: BridgeToken
entries.description: Default ERC20 token contract deployed by the Near Omni Bridge for any tokens that are bridged from other chains to ethereum.

receivedPermissions.description: pause the bridge for deposits and withdrawals.

entries.name: OmniBridge
entries.description: Main bridge contract validating withdrawals, taking deposits and escrowing funds.

issuedPermissions.description: manage all access control roles, upgrade deployed contracts for BridgeTokens, set metadata and config values, manage token registrations, pause and unpause.
pause the bridge for deposits and withdrawals.

nearBridgeDerivedAddress.description: The derived address controlled by the MPC setup, used for signing withdrawals from the escrow on Ethereum.
